articles.author: BHARATHA MALLAWARACHI Associated Press
articles.title: Sri Lankan president seeks party win in parliamentary election to help him push his economic reforms
articles.description: Sri Lankan President Anura Kumara Dissanayake is looking to consolidate his party’s power in Thursday’s parliamentary election to help him implement his election pledges to solve the country’s economic woes and foster good governance

articles.title: Discarding decades of dynastic politics, Sri Lankans to vote for change in parliament poll

articles.author: Sudha Ramachandran
articles.title: Nepali PM to Travel to China on First Bilateral Visit
articles.description: Prime Minister Oli is widely regarded as “pro-China.” His visit to Beijing will deepen that perception.
articles.content:
Nepali Prime Minister Khadga Prasad Sharma Oli is scheduled to visit China on December 2-6.
New Delhi has traditionally been the first port of call for newly sworn-in Nepali prime ministers. However… [+14856 chars]
